name: Adept Raid
description:
You recently lost all your money in gambling and a certain individual yoinked your car.

Gotta try your best to survive in these circumstances.

Buy stuff online and barricade yourself. Don't let her in! Don't let her catch you!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Controls~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Move: WASD

Build wall: E

Build turret: Q

Repair: R

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~How to play~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Streaming -> Money

Eating -> Juice

Survive 6 rounds. Round ends when you scare her away with (harmless) shooting
